title: Upstage AI Hack
description: Developed Contract Management System with LLM & RAG technology. Selected as Thailand representative for the finals by Upstage company.

title: AGTech AI 2023
description: Participated in AgTech AI Incubation 2023, developed PLOOK app with AI for crop planning, won 100,000 THB and Best Improvement award.

title: Hack Me(d) 2023
description: Developed Enterprise Contract Management System with LLM & RAG technology. Selected as Thailand representative for the finals by Korea's leading AGI company.

title: DIS Gen3
description: Participated in Digital Innovation Sandbox 3, developing MEEPROB using PhayaThaiBERT and Bard for business opportunities.

title: CRAD Hack 2024
description: Participating in the CAI Retail Action Detection Hackathon 2023, I developed an AI system using YOLOv8m and VideoMAE for real-time retail behavior analysis.

title: IYIA 2022
description: The IYIA is an international youth innovation competition in Bali. I won a gold medal for predicting Chokanan mango sweetness levels using an AI system.

title: ISIIDS 2022
description: The ISIIDS is an innovation competition for sustainability. I won a silver medal for predicting Chokanan mango sweetness levels using an AI system.

title: ELEMENTZ Fair
description: The 23rd International ELEMENTZ Fair is a science competition in Singapore. I received a commendation award for my AI system predicting Chokanan mango sweetness levels.

title: TJ-SIF 2022
description: Presented my project to the Prime Minister on December 21, 2022, at TJ-SIF 2022 in Chiang Rai, Thailand.

title: TJ-SIF 2022
description: Represented Thailand in the press conference for TJ-SIF 2022 on December 17, 2022, showcasing my AI system for predicting Chokanan mango sweetness levels.

title: CAI Hackathon
description: Won 2nd place at the CAI Club Hackathon 2022 for developing Ling Jak Jak Linebot monkey pox patients, earning a 3,000 THB prize.

title: GPSC 2022
description: Selected as one of the top 30 teams in GPSC YSI Season 5 for AI predicting Chokanan mango sweetness, competing on January 21-22, 2023.

title: NSTDA
description: Selected to join NECTEC and SEC for summer research at NSTDA from March 13 to May 9, 2022, focusing on Biometric Monitoring System and Biometric Authentication.

title: PEA Line bot
description: Collaborated to develop and design a Line bot for Provincial Electricity Authority, aiding in electricity usage notifications and payment details.
